title: Pehnawa The House Of Brand
description: Displays seasonal collections (hats, sneakers, jackets) and categories for women and men.
Click to see related stock details
Add items to the cart from the product page
The cart shows added items, total quantity, and total bill.
Users can add more items or remove existing ones as needed.
Access the homepage anytime via the home icon in the header

title: LiveStock
description: Showcases available livestock categories (e.g., Qurbani, Aqeeqa, Sadka)
Click on a category to view detailed information about each animal.
Users can add animals to their cart from the product details page
Review added animals, total quantity, and total cost; update or remove items as needed.
Secure payment options and cash-on-delivery for purchasing livestock

title: Best Match Application
description: Displays a form where users enter their names and select gender (male or female)
The application calculates and displays a matching percentage based on the entered information.
Shows the calculated percentage on the next screen
Interactive interface for users to input their details and receive results.
Smooth transition from the initial screen to the result screen.

title: Student QR Code (Learning Management System)
description: Separate portals for teachers, students, & admin
Students scan a QR code via a mobile app to mark attendance
Admin handle student & teacher enrollments, assignments, quizzes, & lectures.
Students follow their class schedule based on their roll numbers.
System notifications for both teachers and students.

title: Star Wars
description: Implement and validate forms
Manage tasks with local storage
Simulate API and redirect
Fetch and paginate Star Wars characters
Display detailed character info in a modal.
Use Redux for API calls and state management
Manage tasks with local storage
Create, edit, and delete tasks with local storage for persistence

title: Library Management System
description: Users can browse and borrow books of their interest
Users can bookmark books for future reference
Admins can monitor all activities of borrowers and librarians
Customer can check the rating of the seller
Implement payment methods for overdue fines
Users can manage their borrowing history and requests
